description:
You may have had your suspicions, Game of Thrones fans, but now it's official. Bran Stark will definitely be in the upcoming season, actor Isaac Hempstead Wright says.关于布兰回归《权力的游戏》之前可能会有各种猜测，不过现在消息已经得到证实。布兰·史塔克演员Isaac Hempstead Wright已经亲口确认会在第六季回归。

In an interview with the Irish Examiner, Wright confirmed that after sitting out of the last season, his character will be back for Season 6. "I can't say a lot, but I am back in this season, and it's going to get particularly interesting with Bran," he said. "He has some interesting visions."

在《Irish Examiner》的采访中，Wright向外界确认了这个消息，他扮演的布兰·史塔克将会回归第六季。“我不能透露太多，但是我会在本季回归，而且布兰的故事会非常精彩，”他说。“他可以用特殊的视角看到很多有趣的东西。”

Wright added that he hasn't seen any of the fifth season - he was too busy with exams -- and no, he doesn't know if Jon Snow is alive, either.Wright表示自己还没来得及看《权力的游戏》第五季——他最近在忙于考试——所以他也不知道Jon Snow已经死了。

  • 万万没想到 BBC总结睡眠的10个秘密
  • 瘦一时胖一世：研究称穿紧身裤容易发胖

title: 布兰确认回归《权力的游戏》第六季
